Project Manager Job at C2 Contracting Company Limited

The C2 Contracting Company Limited is a reputable indigenous construction and engineering firm committed to delivering high-quality, sustainable, and cost-effective building and civil works solutions across Nigeria. Registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC), C2 Contracting Company Limited provides a full range of services covering building construction, civil infrastructure, project management, renovation works, and general contracting. Our company is driven by a team of seasoned professionals with extensive experience in design, construction, and project delivery. We pride ourselves on maintaining the highest standards of quality, safety, and integrity in every project we undertake—whether residential, commercial, or industrial. At C2 Contracting, we believe that excellence is built through commitment, innovation, and teamwork. Our goal is to exceed client expectations by delivering projects that combine superior craftsmanship, efficient management, and timely completion.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager

Job Location: Jedo Estate, Airport Road - Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a highly skilled Project Manager to join our growing construction team in Abuja.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for planning, coordinating, and executing construction projects from inception to completion, ensuring quality, safety, and cost-effectiveness throughout.
	This is an exciting opportunity for a result-oriented professional who thrives in a fast-paced construction environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, supervise, and manage day-to-day construction activities across assigned projects.
	Prepare project budgets, work schedules, and progress timelines, ensuring milestones are achieved.
	Oversee procurement, subcontractor management, and resource allocation.
	Ensure strict compliance with HSE standards, building codes, and quality requirements.
	Manage contracts, monitor costs, and control project financial performance.
	Provide leadership, motivation, and guidance to project teams for maximum productivity.
	Act as the key liaison between clients, consultants, contractors, and stakeholders, maintaining excellent relationships.
	Prepare and submit regular project reports, highlighting progress, risks, and solutions to management.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering, Building Technology, Construction Management, Architecture, or related fields.
	3–5 years of  progressive experience in construction project management, with at least 1 year in a supervisory or managerial capacity.
	Proven track record of delivering construction projects on time and within budget.
	Strong knowledge of construction processes, contract administration, and project management tools.
	Proficiency in MS Project, AutoCAD, Primavera, or similar software is desirable.
	Excellent organizational, negotiation, and communication skills.
	Professional certification (PMP, PRINCE2, COREN, or equivalent) will be an added advantage.


What We Offer


	Competitive monthly salary of N250,000 Monthly.
	Opportunity to work on diverse and challenging construction projects in Abuja.
	A dynamic and collaborative work environment with room for career growth.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: thec2contractingcompany@gmail.com using "Project Manager – Abuja" as the subject of the email.
